pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extend 'tinytest' with 'diffobj' and 'tinysnapshot' // The 'tinytest' package offers a light-weight zero-dependency unit- testing framework to which this package adds support via the 'diffobj' package for 'diff'-style textual comparison of R objects, as well as via 'tinysnapshot' package for visual differences in plots.
